transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ha boliye madam.
Customer: Good afternoon sir. Anshika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye madam.
Executive: Ji IndiaMART. Hanji sir kaise chal rahi hai abhi policies aapki?
Customer: Madam maine teen char bar bola nahi abhi kuch chalu nahi hua hai mostly samajh lo thoda thoda ek ek karke do do me ek do lead aa rahi hai kuch najali lead bhi nahi aa rahi hai. Aur maine idhar ke jab apna help manager hai na IndiaMART ka.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Khush me broker maine isko bola tha ek bar dukan pe aake mere ko samjha jao 15 din me do teen bar bola par abhi tak koi nahi aaya mere ko samjhane bilkul.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap mujhe bataiye bataiye kab video meet aapko karni hai abhi keh rahe hai to abhi kar lete hai.
Customer: Ha mere ko aaj dopahar ko karwa do meeting. Online meeting ek bar mere ko usne bola tha main dukan usne bola tha dukan pe aayega aapko maine hamara helper aur aapko samjha dega sab aisa bola tha abhi tak to do teen bar call kiya maine koi bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Offline offline aap bol rahe ho ki physically koi aapke pass jaye samjhane ke liye.
Customer: Hello kya bol rahe ho madam aawaz cut ho raha hai aapka.
Executive: Main bol rahi hu sir aapki jisse baat hui thi unke un unhone bola tha ki koi physically aapke pass jaye offline.
Customer: Nahi usne bola nahi aaya.
Customer: Bar wo isne isne mere ko dusra number diya Ashutosh ka uska number diya wo bhi nahi aaya abhi tak.
Executive: Kya kyuki sir aapka account to main hi handle kar rahi hu aur jaise aapko yaad hoga ki maine online aapko ek bar video meet ki thi usi tarah agar koi bhi aapko problem hoti hai aap mujhe bataiye main video meet se usko theek karungi kitni bar video me madam kuch fayda nahi aa raha hai video me usne bola tha main khud aapko ek bar do bar aapko samjha jayega na to tabhi main bola tha video me kya medium me dukan pe karaki me video call karaga to me kaisa acha rahega. Wo aaya tha mere ko bola tha main karunga main aapka dukan pe aaunga aapko idhar se hamara office idhar hai aapko main aapne help ke liye kuch bhi problem ho to mere ko call karna main aa jaunga sab bol raha tha jab humne chalu karwaya tab to baki abhi tak to koi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Kitne din pehle aapko ye bataya gaya tha physically jisne bataya tha aapko ki wo aayenge kitna time ho gaya.
Customer: Jab humne 15 din minimum maine 15 din me 10 12 call kiya 8 se 10 bar call kiya isko.
Customer: Hamara chalu hua na jab se.
Customer: Kyuki hamara samajh lo pura full place se chalu nahi hua abhi to baki kuch nahi aaj pura lead bhi nahi aa raha hai din ka ek do lead bhi nahi aa raha hai lead aa raha hai to bhi chali ja raha hai ek tarikh ka do tarikh ka humne ek do tarikh ke liye kare nahi hai humne wholesale ka kiya hai to wholesale me wholesale ka lead koi aa hi nahi raha hai humko.
Executive: Bulk wala.
Customer: Bulk wala humko hamara wholesale ka hi kam hai retail ka kam hi nahi hamara madam.
Customer: Jo aa rahi hai kaise lead aa rahi hai ek tarikh ki do tarikh lead aa rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Hello madam aapka aawaz aapka kat kat aa raha hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- No leads are generating.

- Requested for physical visit for explanation.

- No resolution through video call.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to resolve issue through video meet.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, visit, video call
